items.title: Just $5 today gets you this USB-C iPad stylus that looks like an Apple Pencil (80% off)
items.summary:
Apple Pencil alternative for iPad

Buy for $5 (Reg. $25)

Enter promo code 4HDLNIEI for $20 off.

What we love

It may not deliver all the advanced features of the official Apple Pencil, but this budget-friendly stylus covers the basics and then some. You still get useful features such as palm rejection and USB-C charging. It magnetically snaps onto select iPad Pro and iPad Air models as well, and it even looks like one at a bargain. It doesn’t get much less than this if you’re looking for an Apple Pencil alternative to pair with your iPad and try a stylus for the first time.

items.title: Score Bluetti’s unique Handsfree backpack power stations with 100W solar panels from a $399 low, more (Today only)
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Winter Backup Sale, Bluetti is offering up to 47% discounts on three flash units, which will end tonight. The most notable of these price cuts is on Bluetti’s Handsfree 1 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel for $399 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $50, while you can also find the Handsfree 2 Backpack Power Station with a 100W solar panel at $499 shipped, also beating its Amazon pricing by $50. These two bundle packages would normally run you $629 and $799 at full price, with discounts having gone to these rates back during Black Friday and Christmas sales, though the Handsfree 2 did drop a bit further to $448 during October’s Prime Day event. For the rest of the day, you can score $130 or $300 off their going rates, giving you the all-time lowest price we have tracked on the Handsfree 1 bundle and the second-lowest price on the Handsfree 2 bundle. There’s also the third option for the 1,536Wh AC240 Power Station and a 200W solar panel at $1,199 shipped (matching at Amazon), coming down from its going $1,899 rate.

more…

items.title: Originally $140 Belkin 6-port 130W USB-C dock is ready for your workstation down at just $30 today (78% off)
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on docking stations, Woot is Belkin’s 6-port 130W USB-C dock for $29.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This compact dock originally hit the scene carrying a $140 price tag, but it has mostly been fetching close to $100 at Amazon with some occasional jumps back up to its full price. It once hit the $30 mark previously as part of a daily deals offer at Woot, and today’s deal marks the return of that with a whopping 78% markdown. This is the lowest price we have tracked for it to date, and it’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re looking to buy a new docking station.

While it carries a $260 MSRP directly from Worx, you can more often find it down around $230 and $209, with discounts having gone lowest over this past year to $160.
